rows.label: qev011502_MSG0001
rows.name:
What is the single most important trait for a
BLADE operative to possess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011502_MSG0002
rows.name:
I say it is having the presence of mind to react
to any given situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011502_MSG0003
rows.name:
And this Mia woman who keeps flooding the system
with BLADE transfer requests lacks just that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011502_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm at my wit's end. Oh, she possesses drive in spades,
but without more awareness, such drive will lead her
over the proverbial cliff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011502_MSG0005
rows.name:
I don't know what Mia is smiling about,
but that rictus grin makes me...nervous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011502_MSG0006
rows.name:
I only pray she doesn't do anything rash.
She hasn't said anything to you, has she?[ST:wait ]
